title: WOW!!!!
text: After 7month from going out due to COVID we decided to go and celebrate my birthday at Genki. We ordered online and they have a very userfriendly website. The price is very reasonable and great portions. All was very good and we were given the food the time we booked. I would have took photos but the smell was so delicious that we ate all.

title: Simply WOW
text: We planned a family reunion and we were over 30people so we obviously opted for Browns restaurant. The food was delicious as always, although we were a lot the food didn't take long. The service staff were very helpful, polite and quick. Children menu is varied and bathrooms very clean. It was a beautiful lunch with family and Browns restaurant made it even better.

title: Super well done
text: A great excellent friendly hotel. The rooms are super clean and beautiful. We stayed for 4nights and had children with us. The breakfast is so scumptious delicious and with a lot of varity. Very polite smiling staff. Close to metro. Will surely revisit. WELL DONE and effaristos

title: Impressive
text: Though they are ruins they are stinning to see their grandeur from close. It is interesting if you could omagine all rebuilt and the statue of Zeus and Adrian in it. Very beautiful and lots of photos of the site with the acropolis at the back

title: Beautiful views
text: We caught the metro and walked it up to the telefeken the funicular which then took us up to the top. Very tiring to walk up till the funicular if i would rego i would catch a taxi. very clean and worth visiting since you would have a 360 view of athens. there is also a nice church to visit and a great restaurant which also has spectacular views.

title: Interesting
text: The Agora gives you a taste how ancient Greece was. It has the only temple with roof still standing which is rare. throughout the walk make sure you wear comfy shoes and you can admire all. very clean and helpful.

title: Wonderful
text: After visiting Socrates prison... we smelt a wonderful smell and decided to go in. very clean and delicious good. service is excellant friendly waiters with a smile. very genuine food and spectacilar acropolis view. child friendly and pleasant environment. Very clean. all polite

title: Divine
text: The ambient is perfect... great food with good value for money. Fantastic music which together with great food and company makes it a great experience. The plates are abundant and service is great very kind and cheerful. All is fantastic and also clean. The restaurant name truly shows how good it is.... food for gods.

title: Very good and abundant
text: Very local and fresh. Good choice of food and also for children. Very helpful and with a smile, patient to explain ingredients and all.

title: Impressed
text: Beautiful to visit. we went up with 6 and 10yr old. make sure to have comfy shoes and water. the tickets were bought beforehand and there is also an app you can listen too while going up to listen to all about acropolis

title: impressed
text: very good structure, clean and good explanations. lovely video explaining all. backpacks need to be left on cloakroom and there are sections cant take photos.

title: Amazingly done by Eleni
text: What a great 3hours. Eleni our guide made us feel included and it felt like we have known each other for long. our group was made up of different nationalties but we loved every minute. Eleni is GREAT. she showed us every important sight and told us good tips for atteactions food and life in Athens. Our children 6 and 10yrs old had a great time too and didnt even ask one time when it will finish but were sad when the tour concluded. WELL DONE ELENI

title: Very practical and good
text: Very good variety of burgers.... meat...fish ..... chicken and vegeterian. Very good value of money and very good food. surely will return.

title: Splendid afternoon
text: An unusual afternoon spent cruising on the river trent. Food was delicious, heated environment....children were also given crayons and booklet. Pleasant music and wonderful time passed

title: Exquisite
text: Very delicious food. Clean environment and premises. Home made delicious food at very good price. Will surely return.

title: Friendly staff divine food
text: Food was delicious and served well from friendly staff abd good time. Cleanliness throughout especially bathrooms. Well done and keep it up.

title: Sweet corner
text: Lovely cakes and fantastic staff always with a smile and so polite. Healtht food to choose from too apart from mouth watering cakes and a pleasant delicate environment. Well done

title: An adventure out of this world
text: It was a pleasant yet exciting visit. Everything was very well explained and interactive. The planeterium was an absolute experience. Parking 3GBP unlimited time. Clean premises. Souvenir and snack shop available too

title: Comfy great and friendly
text: Very nice hotel. A huge tv in room which is great in world cup weeks. Cleanliness at its best. Child friendly with family rooms. Starbucks in hotel, friendly staff, hot and cold breakfast, pub too, pool and sauna. Great. Surely revisit.

title: A wonderful experience
text: Weather was beautiful and the staff was helpful showed us the tricks of canoeing. Safety always...children had life jackets we were also offered. Surely will come again. Canoe...bicycles on lakes....great. children aged 5 and 8 loved it

title: Never again
text: We went and tried to book online to no avail. The website did not state that weekends is for public while weekdays is for groups. Children were disappointed.....instead we went to barrow boating few minutes far and much nicer

title: Delicious, clean and friendly staff
text: Very good food and value of money. Freshly done and very polite staff. Parking not a problem once you are a customer.

title: 50 shades of greenery
text: Beautiful park. The major oak tree is beautiful and also all the other trees which get you thinking on how old they can be. The walk is pleasant. There is an explanation about robin hood and soucenir shop with good prices. Parking is ample and costs 3GBP unlimited time. Very clean. Near the old major oak tree there is ice cream van.

title: Loads of fun
text:
Very enjoyable time with 2 children aged 5 and 8yrs. Creative golf lanes and nice atmosphere. Ample parking and also snacks available to buy
Very clean

title: Relaxed and nice
text: It was a wonderful experience. Children aged 6 and 9 loved it and even us adults. The train ride is nice and there is also zipline... playground.

title: Never let down
text: Another visit to Browns and again fully satisfied. Beautiful views, delicious food, service with a smile and friendly staff. Well done. Will surely come again.

title: Delicious and efficient
text: Very helpful staff and manager. Delicious food and excellent service. Very clean and quick service. Well done.

title: Cosy clean and delicious food
text: Very good genuine scrumptious food and excellent service by friendly staff. Very good portions and no problem for parking. Sorry no photos but food was too delicious. Child friendly with their own menu and given also drawing books with sharpened pencil colours. Well done. Will surely return.

title: Delicious and worth it
text: Very good food and fresh. Staff very helpful and with a smile. Children menu and variety of food at good reasonable prices. Very clean and nice atmosphere. Children area to play too.

title: Delicious cakes
text: Very nice ambience. Great coffee and cakes. A variety of snacks cakes and food together with a smiling staff is ideal. Cakes can also we bought for take away.

title: Very good abundant food
text: Friendly staff who are very knowledgeable of the menu and all asked. Food very abundant and good price. Beautiful view of marina

title: Not much to see
text: There is not much to see, only few glass ornaments showcase, there is only a video showing how the murano glass is made. You would get a better idea going to a shop which has the glass blower present and currently doing the glass. At first we were told that we could put pushchair in then another lady told me I couldnt and because i spoke in Italian and said "you told me so (yu mi hai detto cosi) she started shouting saying that i should have used the polite form after doing them a favour that i tried to speak italian to make it clear. So if you go get the grammar right.

title: Elegant and good
text: Staff is helpful especially Ms Diana, We had a problem with the AC the first day of our second stay. It was during the heatwave and it was 26degrees in our home. we were offered another room but the AC was not strong and not working properly but the problem was solved as promised. The breakfast is very abundant and there is a variety of items to choose from. The hotel is very clean and well kept and it is positioned in a very good place because Piazzale Roma is 3mins walk and one can easily catch any water buses from there.

title: Marvellous
text: Very good value for money. Food very good tasty and fresh. Waiters and staff very polite and helpful. Definitely will revisit.

title: Delicious and wonderful
text: Food is divine and very original. I took octupus with walnuts and sultanaķs which combined to a delicious unique taste. Very nice environment and the staff are friendly and helpful. Definetely to recommend and we will surely revisit.

title: Interesting and well kept
text: Very lovely museum. Friendly helpers and well informed. We visited during easter time and children were given an egg trail and this ensured children looking everywhere for the eggs but also seeing all in the museum. There is no problem for parking. Plus it is near Wallton hall. Well done. This museum helps you appreciate all the invention and their progress

title: Interesting and majestic
text: Very well kept. Beautiful in sunny and cloudy weathers. Easily to park. Very clean and everything is labelled. Children loved seeing all.

title: Great environment good food
text: Great food and there is good kids menu. Abundant food and friendly staff. Not far from Nottingham castle and space for parking. Nice warm environment. Very pleasant stay.

title: Juicy food wonderful ambience
text: Very good food. Staff is very friendly and helpful. Children entertained by being given crayons. Very good environment

title: Very nice views and good food
text: Efficiency at its best, eating wuth a view of the sea and portions are very good. Staff is helpful and parking no problem at all.

title: Exquisitely good
text: Very good food, original and delicious. Nice environment and very clean. Parking not too much of a problem.

title: Excellant
text: The food was fresh and delicious. Staff were polite and very friendly. Place is spic and span and all clean. Plates were very good and good portions. Well done and keep it up. We will surely return with our family.

title: Typical Maltese food
text: Lovely atmosphere and while one is eating you can also notice typical old maltese th8ngs which were used in daily life. Very good food and very good value of money.

title: Beautiful, delicious and classy
text: A spetecular view, accompanied with deliciously and creatively set food. Very helpful and educated staff. Cleanliness is spectacular, panoramic views even from the lavatories. Price is reasonable for such delicacies and SILVER SERVICE. Well done.

title: Supppper Pizza
text: Very delicious fresh Pizza. Very good service and served with a smile. Pleasing in every way. Well done. No photos of the pizza sorry because we devoured it before taking a photo it was so good.

title: Pampering at its best
text: The hotel is superb. Clean, lavishing and professional. We had a problem with the AC and we were transferred to our new room. Coffee machine in the room. Cleanliness everywhere and helpful staff. The cleanliness is seen throughout the hotel and smiles are always worn on the staff. There is a good choice for breakfast and you can also ask for gluten free bfast. Totally happy and will surely return

title: Fantastic
text: Beautiful view, delicious exquisite food which specialises in fish. Very creative on how presenting food! Helpful staff and clean environment.

title: Molto buono
text: Very good food at good price. Beautiful atmosphere and exquisite food aroma and very clean. Lovely atmosphere and good value for money.

title: Quiet clean place
text: Quiet clean and has also some architectural sites. Walking through the silent town gives you a taste back to medieval time.

title: Beautiful simple church and burial site
text: A humble church in a quiet area which carries solemn atmosphere and opposite to the church there is a burial site with byzantine frescoes.

title: Very good and fresh food
text: Varied fresh food and set menu were worth it. Fresh fish, tender meat and Al dente pasta. Very clean premises and friendly staff.

title: So many flavours...
text: So many flavours that one gets mixed up what to choose. Served with a friendly smile and ice cream is fantastic!

title: 5 star service and food
text: Very abundant portions. Helpful and child friendly. Everything served fresh and presented well. Photos attached are of antipasto. Cleanliness everywhere.

title: Excellent service
text: Breakfast and service is divine. Service with a smile and always ready to help. Wifi very good. Nice walking on promenade close to hotel. Parking not a problem. Very decorative environment. Absolutely clean. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED AND WE WILL SURELY REVISIT. Well done.

title: Smiling service
text: Good prices, good food, very clean and service with a smile. Very caring....they saw us with children...3 and 5yrs and asked me whether they can remove the knife so that they don't get hurt prior to sitting down

title: Good for fish lovers
text: Very good and tasty food. Only fish on the menu, cooked brilliantly with fresh ideas. Prior booking guarantees a place since it is highly sought. When eating here you can be sure that what you are eating is fresh since the menu is limited to the catch of the day which is better.

title: Wonderful dining experience
text: The food was wonderful, service given with a smile and they make you feel pampered. Atmosphere was great. Price is reasonable. Well done and keep it up...will surely return.

title: Sunny and warm country terrace
text: It was a sunny day and this reflected the warm ambience by the staff and glorious food. View is breathtaking, staff helpful and cheerful, food succulent. Well done

title: Family Sunday Lunch
text: To start with the restaurant is situated in an area having a nice scenery of the Maltese port (also having good parking close-by). Due to the rainy weather outside we opted to go inside. All is -accessible for pushchairs (there are bathrooms both upstairs and downstairs) which are very clean and well kept. The atmosphere is warm, modern yet classical with elegant finishings. Seating is very comfortable too. The staff are tremendously friendly, polite and well informed on what the 'day specialities'are and what they consist of (as in ingredients) and always with a smile. The food was divine, delicious, very original, variety to wonder what to choose, fresh and served as ordered. The plates had a good size portion. Drinks were given immediately. It is a child friendly environment because there was a bathroom accessible downstairs and the menu was adapted for our children's likings. Desserts were varied and as described by the waiters. Great value for money since we had first plate, main course, desserts and coffee. A place we will return for sure as we definitely have to try the other dishes. A definite go to for any occasion!

title: Q-Bar & Restaurant is EXCELLANT
text: We have been TOTALLY served at 'Q-Bar' Waterfront. It was a special occasion for my best friend's surprise dinner and it was a success! Great food, good reasonable prices, portions were abundant, cheerful and caring staff! I highly recommend it and will SURELY return. A big YES YES!!
